text: The European Film Award for Best Supporting Actress was awarded by the European Film Academy to actress of European language films. ==Winners and nominees== {| class="wikitable" width="95%" cellpadding="5" |- !width="100"|Year !width="300"|Winner and nominees !width="300"|Film |- |rowspan="4" style="text-align:center;"|1988 (1st)||style="background:#B0C4DE;"| Johanna ter Steege||style="background:#B0C4DE;"|The Vanishing |- | Lene Brøndum||Hip Hip Hurrah! |- | Freda Dowie||Distant Voices, Still Lives |- | Karin Gregorek||Bear Ye One Another's Burden |- | style="text-align:center;"|1989 (2nd)||colspan="3"|no award given see European Film Award for Best Supporting Performance |- |rowspan="3" style="text-align:center;"|1990 (3rd)||style="background:#B0C4DE;"| Malin Ek||style="background:#B0C4DE;"|The Guardian Angel |- | Lena Nylen||The Guardian Angel |- | Gunilla Röör||The Guardian Angel |- |rowspan="3" style="text-align:center;"|1991 (4th)||style="background:#B0C4DE;"| Marta Keler||style="background:#B0C4DE;"|Virginia |- | Sandrine Blancke||Toto the Hero |- | Barbara Sukowa||Voyager |- |rowspan="3" style="text- align:center;"|1992 (5th)||style="background:#B0C4DE;"| Ghita Nørby||style="background:#B0C4DE;"|Freud's Leaving Home |- | Bulle Ogier||Nord |- | Evelyne Didi||La Vie de Bohème |- | style="text-align:center;"|after 1992 ||colspan="3" style="text-align:center;"| award discontinued |- |} ==See also== * BAFTA Award for Best Actress in a Supporting Role * César Award for Best Supporting Actress * David di Donatello for Best Supporting Actress * Goya Award for Best Supporting Actress * Polish Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ==External links== *European Film Academy archive Supporting Actress Category:Film awards for supporting actress Category:Awards established in 1988 Category:1988 establishments in Europe Category:Former awards
title: European Film Award for Best Supporting Actress
